label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value:
Fruitwood sheath with four curved sides, tapered, carved in relief with biblical scenes. Front: The Creation, Garden of Eden, Resurrection, Jonah (carved IONAS). Reverse: Mary holding infant Jesus, Crucifixion, Baptism (?) of John (?), Jesse (carved IESSE). Sides with twisted border and 6 crowned figures. One side carved with initials W.G.W., reverse with 1555.

Silver lip mount with two slots, lip on one side with small ring attached. Engraved with foliage and twisted wire border. Lacks point mount.

label: Dimensions
value: H (Sheath): 15.5 cm (6 1/8 in.) L x W (mount): 3.1 x 2.4 cm (1 1/4 x 15/16 in.)

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Two pronged steel fork with shaped shaft. Tapered plain silver cylindrical handle (seamed) with rounded end and raised button. Engraved with crest: "gryphon's head" (unidentified).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Cast, three-tined fork, square shoulder. Central tine elongated. Polygonal stem terminating in flat hoof-like pad.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Cast oval concave bowl. Polygonal stem terminating in hoof. Tapered rib on reverse of bowl.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Four-tined fork, sloping shoulders. Neck pierced with trefoil. Scroll stem at neck, paired knops on cylindrical stem. Finial flat openwork scrolls surrounding movable openwork knop with loose bead inside.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Long two tined fork, tines cast with stem as stylized crustacean. Twisted stem. Foliate knop at juncture with handle. Octagonal wood handle, silver cap and terminal cap. Finial cast as seated dog on a battlement.

label: Provenance
value: Rothschild Collection/ Blumka Gallery, New York/ Robert L. Metzenberg

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Long flat leaf-shaped blade. Ribbed bolster. Almond-section handle, wood scales inlaid with metal wires in scrolls, trefoils and dots along length. Steel cap at terminal.

label: Provenance
value: Blumka Gallery, New York/ Robert L. Metzenberg

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Long two-tined fork, decorated at the inside of the rounded shoulders; short baluster stem. Tapered wooden handle of oval section with beaked end; handle divided latually by bands of laminated horn, silver, gold; handle piqué and inlaid with rozettes and dots of different metals. Rozette on flat end.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Scimitar-shaped blade, drop bolster with baluster-shaped neck. Handle similar to fork (1985-103-37).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has two long pointed tines, rounded shoulders. Baluster-shaped neck, octagonal in section, gilded and laminated wood, steel, brass socket. Bone pistol-shaped handle, inlaid with brass wire and small wooden bands in diaper pattern. Lozenges filled with wooden dots and brass wire. End of handle inlaid with rozette.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has two long tines with baluster neck. Tapered silver handle with segmented panels to form rectangular profile. Front and back panels chased with decorative pattern fluted end with raised knop; Handle engraved at end with "A" (converse) and "H" (reverse).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Elongated blade with straight cutting edge, upper edge tapering downward to the point, engraved with profile scrolled pattern on both sides; at bolster coverse with eagle, reverse with fleur-de-lis. Handle similar to 1985-103-39.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Tapered metal sheath, flat on the back side, upper surface curved to create semi-oval. Back chased in floral scroll pattern, upper surface engraved and pierced in three panels. Upper male figure flanked by scrolls and turns. Centre grotesque figure, near bottom an embracing couple flanked by two figures. On top of back side crossed belt attachment. Inscribed: H S , 1668.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Long pointed blade, corroded. Curved rectangular guard. Tang ends in flat trefoil. Wooden scales (not original).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value:
Carved wooden sheath for two implements. The body of the sheath divided in four vertical parts. Front has six carved biblical scenes, at the bottom an angel holding a shield. On the back six scenes of men feasting, drinking, etc. On the two sides, six apostles with their emblems, "WGW" carved on one side, "1589" on the reverse.

Plain rectangular silver cap with rounded sides, slides on to sheath (1985-103-42-a). [Replaced?]

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value:
Tapered case for two implements. Stamped horizontal bands with decorative pattern of scrolls, fleur-de-lis, lozenges and rosettes. Segmented beaded borders. Two attachment rings on the sides. Plain end with pointed finial.

Stamped silver cap slides on to sheath (1985-103-43-a). Two attachment rings on the sides. Similar decorative pattern to that of sheath.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Leaf-shaped blade tapering towards the point. Decorative indentions on the upper edge. Blade engraved with scrolled pattern, gilded near bolster. Waisted bolster with stylized leaves and beaded horizontal band. Handle with niello scrolled pattern at back and front. Finial of volute capital, dark blue enamel, surmounted by rose enamel gadrooned urn and rozette at green enamel.

label: Physical description
value: Steel, niello, brass, enamel, emerald, gilding

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Small knife with leaf-shaped blade. Upper rib on side with engraved scroll device, a gilded crest at bolster, reverse with gilded engraved fleur-de-lis. Handle decorated with volute scrolls, capital, and an octagonal column inlaid with coral dots, scroll capital. End of handle in the form of a winged figure; oriental male on front, grotesque female on reverse. Traces of gilding on handle.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Straight-sided blade, the upper edge tapering downwards to the point. Decorative indentions on the upper edge. Plain bolster, handle square in section, flaring towards the end, cumulating in a stylized bird's head. Tang continues with scrolled edge, fitted with mother-of-pearl scales with three rivets, top of handle has horn scales. Two large brass buttons on each side.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Scimitar-shaped blade with rounded end. Octagonal socket of plain brass. Handle of wood carved with female virtues: Faith, Hope and Charity all holding their attributes.

label: Physical description
value: Cut and honed steel, carved wood, cut sheet brass

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Saber-shaped blade with concave bolster. Tapered silver handle with segmented panels to form rectangular profile. Front and back panels chased with decorative pattern fluted end with raised knop. Handle engraved at end with "A" (converse) and "H" (reverse).

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Two-tined fork, baluster shaft. Octagonal plain brass socket. Carved wooden handle, three-dimensional figure of St. George on horse slaying the Dragon.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Saber-shaped blade (replacement) with reeded socket. Turned and carved wooden handle depicts a female at balcony and a reverse nude female in bath. Both figures surmounted by draping swags. Carved handle terminal.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has four, slightly curved tines, rounded shoulders. Flat flaring neck, octagonal metal socket with twisted wire at edges. Carved wooden handle with four figures; Faith, Hope, Charity and Justice with their attributes, surmounted by scrolls, shell with bird and figure of cherub riding a lion. Around bottom of handle: "IK.LEEF.OP.HOOP" (I am living on hope.) Engraved on socket: KID

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Sabre-shaped blade with globular bolster. Tubular-tapered handle covered beadwork in multi-colored spiral-floral bands on a white ground.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Fork has two long pointed tines, rounded shoulders, baluster-shaped neck, beadwork handle. Similar to 1985-103-53.

label: Description
value: Two-tined fork, baluster stem. Tubular-tapered handle, beaded with multi-color floral bands in spirals, ground of white beads, blue, yellow and green beaded bands.

label: Description
value: Scimitar-shaped blade with rounded end and baluster stem. Tubular tapered handle multi-color floral bands in spirals, on white bead ground, separatedby blue, yellow and green beadwork border.

label: Description
value: Scimitar-shaped blade. Tapered handle decorated with multi-colored glass beads; floral pattern in green, blue, brown and yellow on white ground.

label: Description
value: Two-tined fork with baluster neck. Tapered handle decorated with multi- colored glass beads; floral pattern in green, blue, brown and yellow on white ground.

value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Two-tined fork, curved shoulders and baluster neck. Handle hexagonal in section; bone inlaid with circular motifs of mother-of-pearl and brass. Brass mounts decorated with circular motifs.

label: Credit line
value: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg

label: Description
value: Tapered straight-sided blade, plain bolster. Handle with fluted joint at blade, surmounted by gold band, raised quatre foil and circle bands arranged lengthwise, silver crown and gold facetted bands on dressed silver; end with hollow crown of eight bands, four beaded, topped with ball-shaped finial with fleur-de-lis in gold.
